parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain name. You can call the [DescribeDomains](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/zh/dns/api-alidns-2015-01-09-describedomains?spm=a2c63.p38356.help-menu-search-29697.d\_0) operation to obtain the domain name.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

Default: **zh**

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description:
The remarks. The remarks can be up to 50 characters in length and can contain only letters, digits, periods (.), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).

Delete the original remarks when it is empty.
